text: The ice hockey team rosters at the 1952 Winter Olympics consisted of the following players: ==Canada== George Abel, John Davies, Billie Dawe (captain), Bruce Dickson, Donald Gauf, William Gibson, Ralph Hansch, Bob Meyers, David Miller, Eric Paterson, Thomas Pollock, Allan Purvis, Gordon Robertson, Louis Secco, Francis Sullivan, Bob Watt. Head coach: Louis Holmes ==Czechoslovakia== Slavomír Bartoň, Miloslav Blažek, Václav Bubník, Vlastimil Bubník, Miloslav Charouzd, Bronislav Danda, Karel Gut (captain), Vlastimil Hajšman, Jan Lidral, Miroslav Nový, Miloslav Ošmera, Zdeněk Pýcha, Miroslav Rejman, Jan Richter, Oldřich Sedlák, Jiří Sekyra, Jozef Záhorský. Head coach: Jiří Tožička Assistant coach: Josef Herman ==Finland== Yrjö Hakala, Aarne Honkavaara (captain), Erkki Hytönen, Pentti Isotalo, Matti Karumaa, Ossi Kauppi, Keijo Kuusela, Kauko Mäkinen, Pekka Myllylä, Christian Rapp, Esko Rekomaa, Matti Rintakoski, Eero Saari, Eero Salisma, Lauri Silván, Unto Wiitala, Jukka Wuolio. Head coach: Risto Lindroos Assistant coach: Joe Wirkkunen ==Germany== Karl Bierschel, Markus Egen, Karl Enzler, Georg Guggemos, Alfred Hoffmann, Engelbert Holderied, Walter Kremershof, Ludwig Kuhn, Dieter Niess, Hans Pescher, Fritz Poitsch, Herbert Schibukat (captain), Xaver Unsinn, Heinz Wackers, Karl Wild. Head coach: Joe Aitken ==Norway== Jan Erik Adolfsen, Arne Berg, Egil Bjerklund, Per Dahl, Bjørn Gulbrandsen, Bjørn Oscar Gulbrandsen, Finn Gundersen, Arthur Kristiansen, Gunnar Kroge, Johnny Larntvet (captain), Roar Pedersen, Annar Petersen, Ragnar Rygel, Leif Solheim, Øivind Solheim, Roy Strandem, Per Voigt. Head coach: Bud McEachern ==Poland== Michał Antuszewicz, Henryk Bromowicz, Kazimierz Chodakowski, Stefan Csorich (captain), Rudolf Czech, Alfred Gansiniec, Jan Hampel, Marian Jeżak, Eugeniusz Lewacki, Roman Penczek, Hilary Skarżyński, Tadeusz Świcarz, Stanisław Szlendak, Zdzisław Trojanowski, Antoni Wróbel, Alfred Wróbel. Head coach: Mieczysław Kasprzycki ==Sweden== Göte Almqvist, Hans Andersson-Tvilling, Stig Andersson-Tvilling, Åke Andersson, Lars Björn, Göte Blomqvist, Thord Flodqvist, Erik Johansson (captain), Gösta Johansson, Rune Johansson, Sven Johansson, Åke Lassas, Holger Nurmela, Hans Öberg, Lars Pettersson, Lars Svensson, Sven Thunman. Coaches: Folke "Masen" Jansson, Herman Carlsson ==Switzerland== Hans Bänninger, Gian Bazzi, François Blank, Bixio Celio, Reto Delnon, Walter Dürst, Émile Golaz, Emil Handschin, Paul Hofer, Willy Pfister, Gebhard Poltera, Ulrich Poltera (captain), Otto Schläpfer, Otto Schubiger, Alfred Streun, Hans-Martin Trepp, Paul Wyss. Head coach: Bibi Torriani ==United States== Rube Bjorkman, Len Ceglarski, Joseph Czarnota, Richard Desmond, Andy Gambucci, Clifford Harrison, Gerald Kilmartin, John Mulhern, John Noah, Arnold Oss, Robert Rompre, James Sedin, Allen Van (captain), Donald Whiston, Ken Yackel. Head coach: Connie Pleban ==References== ==Sources== * * *Hockey Hall Of Fame page on the 1952 Olympics * * rosters 1952
title: Ice hockey at the 1952 Winter Olympics – Rosters
